The BB allows you to build your own delicious burger, login/signup, place your order and review what youâ€™ve ordered. I used React Hooks, Redux for state management, Jest/Enzyme for testing and Firebase for data-storing & authentication. The application is also fully responsive and is one of the projects Iâ€™m very proud of.", previewImage: "", livePreview: "https://react-my-burger-builder-d060b.web.app/", gitHub: "https://github.com/Brainilio/burger-builder", tags: ["REACTJS", "FIREBASE", "REDUX"], category: "Front-End", longerDescription: "", dateCreated: "AUGUST 5, 2020", fullImages: ["", "", ""], }, ]) return (
